languages.text: "Я предупреждал тебя, Вольный Торговец. Ты пропах{mf||ла} скверной от головы до пят. Даже достойная смерть не смоет с тебя этот смрад. Инквизитор может прощать тебе что угодно, но мне в твоей дружине ходить зазорно. Прощай". {n}Ульфар сплевывает и презрительно взирает мимо вас.{/n}

"I warned you, Rogue Trader. You reek of corruption from head to toe. Even an honourable death will not wash away the stench. The Inquisitor is free to absolve you of whatever he likes, but for me, being part of your warband is a disgrace. Farewell." {n}Ulfar spits and stares past you contemptuously.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я предупреждал тебя, Вольный Торговец. Ты пропах{mf||ла} скверной от головы до пят. Даже достойная смерть не смоет с тебя этот смрад. Инквизитор может прощать тебе что угодно, но мне в твоей дружине ходить зазорно. Прощай". {n}Ульфар сплевывает и презрительно взирает мимо вас.{/n}

The Inquisitor is free to absolve you of whatever he likes, but for me, being part of your warband is a disgrace. Farewell." {n}Ulfar spits and stares past you contemptuously.{/n}

languages.text: “我警告过你，行商浪人，你从头到脚都散发着腐化的恶臭，哪怕是光荣牺牲也洗不清你身上的臭味。审判官自然可以随意赦免你的罪行，但对我而言，加入你的战团是一种耻辱。永别了。”{n}乌尔法吐了口唾沫，轻蔑地瞪了你一眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I warned you, Rogue Trader. You reek of corruption from head to toe. Even an honourable death will not wash away the stench. The Inquisitor is free to absolve you of whatever he likes, but for me, being part of your warband is a disgrace. Farewell." {n}Ulfar spits and stares past you contemptuously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我警告过你，行商浪人，你从头到脚都散发着腐化的恶臭，哪怕是光荣牺牲也洗不清你身上的臭味。审判官自然可以随意赦免你的罪行，但对我而言，加入你的战团是一种耻辱。永别了。”{n}乌尔法吐了口唾沫，轻蔑地瞪了你一眼。{/n}

languages.text: 「警告したはずだ、自由開拓者。お前は頭の先からつま先まで腐敗している。名誉の死でさえ、腐敗臭を洗い流せないだろう。異端審問官がお前を好きなように扱っても構わない。だが俺にとって、お前の軍の一員であることは不名誉なことだ。さらばだ」{n}ウルファーは唾を吐き捨て、あなたをせせら笑いつつ見やる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I warned you, Rogue Trader. You reek of corruption from head to toe. Even an honourable death will not wash away the stench. The Inquisitor is free to absolve you of whatever he likes, but for me, being part of your warband is a disgrace. Farewell." {n}Ulfar spits and stares past you contemptuously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「警告したはずだ、自由開拓者。お前は頭の先からつま先まで腐敗している。名誉の死でさえ、腐敗臭を洗い流せないだろう。異端審問官がお前を好きなように扱っても構わない。だが俺にとって、お前の軍の一員であることは不名誉なことだ。さらばだ」{n}ウルファーは唾を吐き捨て、あなたをせせら笑いつつ見やる。{/n}

languages.text: «Se lo advertí, Comerciante Independiente. Apesta a corrupción de pies a cabeza. Ni siquiera una muerte honorable lo remediaría. El Inquisidor es libre de absolverle de lo que quiera, pero para mí, formar parte de su banda es una desgracia. Adiós». {n}Ulfar escupe y te mira con desprecio.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I warned you, Rogue Trader. You reek of corruption from head to toe. Even an honourable death will not wash away the stench. The Inquisitor is free to absolve you of whatever he likes, but for me, being part of your warband is a disgrace. Farewell." {n}Ulfar spits and stares past you contemptuously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Se lo advertí, Comerciante Independiente. Apesta a corrupción de pies a cabeza. Ni siquiera una muerte honorable lo remediaría. El Inquisidor es libre de absolverle de lo que quiera, pero para mí, formar parte de su banda es una desgracia. Adiós». {n}Ulfar escupe y te mira con desprecio.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch gewarnt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ihr stinkt von Kopf bis Fuß nach Verderbnis. Selbst ein ehrenhafter Tod kann den Gestank nicht abwaschen. Der Inquisitor darf Euch Absolution erteilen, wofür er möchte, doch für mich ist es eine Schande, Teil Eurer Kriegsbande zu sein. Lebt wohl." {n}Ulfar spuckt aus und starrt voller Verachtung an dir vorbei.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I warned you, Rogue Trader. You reek of corruption from head to toe. Even an honourable death will not wash away the stench. The Inquisitor is free to absolve you of whatever he likes, but for me, being part of your warband is a disgrace. Farewell." {n}Ulfar spits and stares past you contemptuously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch gewarnt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ihr stinkt von Kopf bis Fuß nach Verderbnis. Selbst ein ehrenhafter Tod kann den Gestank nicht abwaschen. Der Inquisitor darf Euch Absolution erteilen, wofür er möchte, doch für mich ist es eine Schande, Teil Eurer Kriegsbande zu sein. Lebt wohl." {n}Ulfar spuckt aus und starrt voller Verachtung an dir vorbei.{/n}

languages.text: « Je vous avais {mf|prévenu|prévenue}, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Vous empestez la corruption des pieds à la tête. Même une mort honorable ne pourra pas vous laver d'une telle puanteur. L'inquisiteur est libre de vous absoudre s'il le souhaite, mais pour ma part, je refuse de continuer à me couvrir de honte en restant dans votre troupe. Adieu. » {n}Ulfar crache au sol et regarde délibérément par-dessus votre épaule, comme si vous n'existiez plus à ses yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I warned you, Rogue Trader. You reek of corruption from head to toe. Even an honourable death will not wash away the stench. The Inquisitor is free to absolve you of whatever he likes, but for me, being part of your warband is a disgrace. Farewell." {n}Ulfar spits and stares past you contemptuously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je vous avais {mf|prévenu|prévenue}, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Vous empestez la corruption des pieds à la tête. Même une mort honorable ne pourra pas vous laver d'une telle puanteur. L'inquisiteur est libre de vous absoudre s'il le souhaite, mais pour ma part, je refuse de continuer à me couvrir de honte en restant dans votre troupe. Adieu. » {n}Ulfar crache au sol et regarde délibérément par-dessus votre épaule, comme si vous n'existiez plus à ses yeux.{/n}

languages.text: "Seni uyarmıştım Hür Tacir. Gırtlağına kadar yozluğa batmış hâldesin. Şerefli bir ölümle bile o bataktan kurtulamazsın. Engizisyoncu seni dilediği kadar affedebilir ama saflarında bulunmak, benim için utanç verici. Elveda." {n}Ulfar, tükürüp küçümseyici bir ifadeyle arkana doğru bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I warned you, Rogue Trader. You reek of corruption from head to toe. Even an honourable death will not wash away the stench. The Inquisitor is free to absolve you of whatever he likes, but for me, being part of your warband is a disgrace. Farewell." {n}Ulfar spits and stares past you contemptuously.{/n}
